title: Rads error PLEASE HELP
body:
I was in a game and as soon as it finished i was logged out of League Of Legends and it wouldn't let me go back in. "Could Not Connect To The HTTP Server, Please check that your internet connection and that your firewall is not blocking access." Anyway to fix it ?
A couple of my other friends are experiencing the same problem as well and believe me  i have tried every single possible thing

replies.body:
Guys, i found out how to fix the problem,
Go on Control panel, network and internet, network and sharing center, change adapter settings, your connection, press properties, internet protocol 4, do preferred DNS server address as 8.8.8.8 and alternative as 8.8.4.4
Worked for me! Thanks so much!
